----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Project : MecWise.WorkflowCommon Class : WorkflowCommon.Recipient
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Recipent class. Contains Information about a Workflow Recipient
[Binesh] 9/26/2006 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 3.0.5000.20, 16 Feb 2012 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added new property for recipient sequence, as custom routing list is entered with wrong sequence
Version 5.0.0.15, 25-Feb-12 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added new property to support recipient action due in Hours/Minutes (besides in Days)

member.name: P:MecWise.WorkflowCommon.Recipient.Sequence
member.summary: Gets or sets the recipient sequence in the routing list

members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gets or sets the recipient at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the recipient to get or set. The element at the specified index
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Project : MecWise.WorkflowCommon Class : WorkflowCommon.WorkflowFunctions
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Standard Worklow Functions.
Provides an API to interface with the Workflow Service
[Binesh] 9/26/2006 Created
Version 3.0.5000.4, 16 Jul 2007 by Rajeeb Sharma - Updated StartRout() to add each company to the list.
Version 3.0.5000.5, 27 Jul 2007 by Rajeeb Sharma - Updated StartRout() to add custom recipients according to their roles. - Changed the recipient sequence of the custom recipients.
Version 3.0.5000.6, 25 Nov 2007 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added Shared global object of WorkflowRequestHelper. - Store the Screen object in WorkflowRequestHelper to check for special routing list. - Updated StartRout() to use global object of WorkflowRequestHelper class.
Version 3.0.5000.7, 18 Dec 2007 by Rajeeb Sharma - Changed default RoutingCheck() to check routing list according to APP_ID settings. - For example, SDA_LTA/SDA_LTC routing list checking is based on LEAV_TYPE in LEV_MF_RECIPS table.
Version 3.0.5000.9, 21 Apr 2009 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added SRL_NO in applink for SDA_APR(Appraisal Module). Currently hard-coded checking of APP_ID.
Version 3.0.5000.10, 01 Jul 2009 by Rajeeb Sharma - Fixed StartRout() to add higher/additional recipients in the order of recipient's role, lineNo passed to procedure. - As email is being sent by service, additional recipients added in the end are not sent email notification.
Version 3.0.5000.11, 15 Aug 2009 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added checking for recipient existing in recipient list(WF_REQUEST_RECIPS) before adding additional recipients. - To cater to enhancement, where the full routing list is sent from BO in recipient collection to StartRout().
Version 3.0.5000.12, 06 Nov 2009 by Rajeeb Sharma - Changed view name in RoutingCheck to cater routing list checking in both WF_MF_RECIPS and LEV_MF_RECIPS tables.
Version 3.0.5000.13, 16 Mar 2010 by Rajeeb Sharma - Overloaded StartRout() to allow RequestorId specified from BO.
Version 3.0.5000.14, 11 May 2010 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added support for Approve/Deny workflow requests from BO.
Version 3.0.5000.15, 18 Oct 2010 by Rajeeb Sharma
Version 3.0.5000.16, 05 Apr 2011 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added support for Clarify workflow requests from BO.
Version 3.0.5000.17, 21 Jun 2011 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added support for Redirect workflow requests from BO.
Version 3.0.5000.18, 01 Sep 2011 by Rajeeb Sharma - Fixed wrong EMPE_ID used for SUBMIT_ID (in WF_REQUEST), when custom routing list (like Positiong Management) used.
Version 3.0.5000.19, 01 Dec 2011 by Rajeeb Sharma - Support SRL_NO in APP_KEY for SDA_APR_MY App ID.
Version 3.0.5000.20, 05 Jan 2012 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added DeleteRecipientList function missing in V3 migration
Version 3.0.5000.20, 16 Feb 2012 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added support for Recipient Sequence specified from BO for additional recipient/custom routing list. (wrong sequence and line no entered, in case of custom routing list).
Version 4.0.5000.2, 15 Nov 2012 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added support for replacing the standard routing list by custom list completely (changed StartRout() definition).
Version 4.0.5000.4, 26 Aug 2013 by Yemm - Fixed issue of View Document for cross-company using ROUTE_ID, changed column name as table definition changed.
Version 4.0.5000.5, 09 Oct 2013 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added SRL_NO in APP_LINK for SDA_PRJ and SDA_6MA in both the StartRout functions.
Version 4.0.5000.6, 22 Apr 2014 by Rajeeb Sharma - Removed hardcoded APP_IDs using custom AppLink and moved them to database to support more APP_IDs in future.
Version 4.0.5000.7, 03 Sep 2015 by Rajeeb Sharma - Fixes for cross-company recipient info not inserted into WF_EMPE_LIST, when added from BO.
Version 4.0.5000.8, 02 Nov 2015 by Rajeeb Sharma - Fixes for replacing SV_MF_PREFER with SV_WF_MF_PREFER and column name changes in RoutingCheck().
Version 4.0.5000.10, 25 Sep 2017 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added retry StartRout() to avoid deadlock situation.
Version 5.0.0.2, 26-Mar-18 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added functionality for Clarify (select specific recipient) and Clarify All for workflow requests. - Added support for mandatory remarks checking and CC routing for workflow actions launched from application BOs.
Verison 5.0.0.3, 30-Apr-18 by Adidam Jyothirmai - Added functionality for Clarify Select (select multiple recipients) for clarification.
Version 5.0.0.4, 16-May-18 by Adidam Jyothirmai - Added functionality for Approve/Deny/Clarify/Clarify(select specific recip)/Clarify All/Clarify Select. (functions to be used from application BOs)
Version 5.0.0.5, 17-May-18 by Adidam Jyothirmai - Added functionality to auto Start workflow request (to bypass workflow service initiating request).
Version 5.0.0.6, 26-May-18 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added support to retrieve Workflow ID for customized APP_LINK (instead of standard COMP_CODE+DOC_TYPE+DEPT_CODE+RUN_NO).
Version 5.0.0.8, 13-Jun-18 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added support to launch customized OS for Action screen provider (instead of configured screen ID).
Version 5.0.0.9, 25-Jun-18 by Adidam Jyothirmai - Added support for multiple values in customized APP_LINK (comma-separated column IDs may be configured). (By default the APP_LINK=COMP_CODE+DOC_TYPE+DEPT_CODE+RUN_NO and previously supported additional hardcoded column SRL_NO).
Version 5.0.0.10, 01-Aug-18 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added support for customized (Application/Approval) history screens based on preference settings.
Version 5.0.0.11, 05-Sep-18 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added support for not to send email on specific action taken on workflow request.
Version 5.0.0.12, 22-May-19 by Rajeeb Sharma - Fixes for delegate recipient taking Clarify action, APPROVED_BY and RECIP_REMARKS, not updated correctly.
Version 5.0.0.14, 29-Nov-19 by Rajeeb Sharma - Fixes for Redirect() call from BO, as wrong parameters passed.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gets the Workflow ID for the specified Record
A reference to the CommonFunctions class Reference to the screen object that contains the field collection for which the workflow id needs to be retrieved The Workflow ID for the record
The Fields collection must have the following fields. COMP_CODE,DOC_TYPE,DEPT_CODE,RUN_NO
[Binesh] 9/26/2006 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gets the Workflow ID for the specified Record
An EPSession object Company Code Document Type Department Code Run Number The Workflow ID for the record
APP_LINK is made up of COMP_CODE : DOC_TYPE : DEPT_CODE : RUN_NO
[Binesh] 9/26/2006 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: M:MecWise.WorkflowCommon.WorkflowFunctions.GetWFID(ePlatform.CommonClasses.EPSession,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the Workflow ID based on APP_LINK (to support customized APP_LINKs)
member.returns: Workflow ID for the record

members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Initializes the routing process.
A reference to the CommonFunctions class Reference to the screen object that contains the field collection for which the workflow needs to be initialized Custom text to be displayed in the email notification RecipientCollection object to store custom recipients based on business rules True if routing for the specified application could be initialized and started. False otherwise
The following fields need to be present in the Fields collection. COMP_CODE,DOC_TYPE,DEPT_CODE,RUN_NO,APP_ID,EMPE_ID
[Binesh] 9/26/2006 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Initializes the routing process.
A reference to the CommonFunctions class Reference to the screen object that contains the field collection for which the workflow needs to be initialized Requestor Id. Custom text to be displayed in the email notification RecipientCollection object to store custom recipients based on business rules True if routing for the specified application could be initialized and started. False otherwise
The following fields need to be present in the Fields collection. COMP_CODE,DOC_TYPE,DEPT_CODE,RUN_NO,APP_ID,EMPE_ID
[Binesh] 9/26/2006 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Initializes the routing process.
An EPSession object containing the connection to the application database Company code Document type Department code Running number Application ID assigned to the module Employee ID / Requestor ID Custom text to be displayed in the email notification RecipientCollection object to store custom recipients based on business rules. True if routing for the specified application could be initialized and started. False otherwise
[Binesh] 9/26/2006 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Checks if routing conditions are satisifed
A reference to the CommonFunctions class Reference to the screen object that contains the field collection for which the routing check needs to be done True if all conditions are satisfied. False otherwise
The Fields collection must have the following fields. APP_ID, EMPE_ID
[Binesh] 9/26/2006 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: M:MecWise.WorkflowCommon.WorkflowFunctions.RoutingCheck(epObjects.epState,epObjects.epScreen)
member.summary: Routing list checking in custom routing list tables according to APP_ID settings.
member.returns: Message on successful/unsuccessful checking of routing list.
member.remarks: The field collection must have necessary fields for checking according to APP_ID settings.

members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Checks if routing conditions are satisifed
An EPSession object Language ID for the application Application ID Requestor ID. Normally the Employee ID True if all conditions are satisfied. False otherwise
To make sure that: 1) There is a routing list
2) There is atleast one routing officer for mandatory Roles.
3) For all Roles, other than those with ROLE_MULTIPLE value as 'Y', to have One and only one officer.
4) For all Roles, other than those with RECIP_MULTIPLE value as 'Y', to have that officer in only this role
5) For all Roles, other than those with ROLE_SELF value as 'Y', to have Recipient is not Applicant.
[Binesh] 9/26/2006 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: M:MecWise.WorkflowCommon.WorkflowFunctions.DeleteRecipentList(ePlatform.CommonClasses.EPSession,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the recipient list
member.returns: True if recipient list deleted successfully, False otherwise.

members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gets the Recipent based on the role and Symbolic Reference
EP Session object Company Code Application ID Workflow Role Symbolic Reference The recipient id
Resolves Symbolic Names to actual Employee Names. For example. HRManager can be resolved to an employee with the ID ABC This helps the user to set once and forget the settings. Order Of Search
1. COMP_CODE = [value],SYM_ID= [value],APP_ID= [value],ROLE_ID = [value] 2. COMP_CODE = [value],SYM_ID= [value],APP_ID= [value],ROLE_ID LIKE [value] 3. COMP_CODE = [value],SYM_ID= [value],APP_ID LIKE [value],ROLE_ID LIKE [value] If no value is found. The Symbolic ID is returned
[Binesh] 9/26/2006 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Terminates the workflow for the specified record.
A reference to the CommonFunctions class Reference to the screen object that contains the field collection for which the workflow needs to be cancelled True if workflow could be cancelled successfully. false otherwise
The Fields collection must have the following fields. APP_ID, WF_ID
[Binesh] 9/26/2006 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Terminates the workflow for the specified record.
An EPSession object Application ID Workflow ID True if workflow could be cancelled successfully. false otherwise
Sets REQ_CMD = 'CNNF' and REPL_STATE = 'N'
[Binesh] 9/26/2006 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Enables Single Sign-on for worflow screens for cross compant workflow routings
The screen object Reference Company Key. Used to retrieve Logon Information from connectInfo.config Reference Key Gets the Signon Key that needs to be passed as a parameter. Gets the connection string configured for the reference key Gets the URL that needs to be executed or launched that will display the cross company application record. True of sign on information could be processed successfully, false otherwise
Makes an entry WF_SIGN_ON table in the DB identified by the reference company key.
[Binesh] 9/26/2006 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sends a custom email using the workflow service.
EPSession Object Can be N or NQ where N = New Job and NQ = DIRECTLY QUEUE JOB Name of the user who initiated this request the e-mail address of the sender A semicolon-delimited list of recipient e-mail addresses A semicolon-delimited list of e-mail addresses that receive a carbon copy (CC) of the e-mail message A semicolon-delimited list of email addresses that receive a blind carbon copy (BCC) of the e-mail message The subject line of the e-mail message The body of the e-mail message The date when the email message is to be sent Gets the error message if any if the job request could not be added successfully. True if job request is added successfully, false otherwise
Interfaces with the JOB_MAIL table.
[Binesh] 9/26/2006 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

If applicant = current recipient, preference settings overwritten and Clarify action is disabled

members.member:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Project : MecWise.WorkflowCommon Class : WorkflowCommon.WorkflowRequestHelper
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Helper class for WorkflowRequest
Helper class for WorkflowRequest
[Binesh] 9/26/2006 Created
Version 3.0.5000.5, 27 Jun 2007 by Rajeeb - Added new function GetRecipientSequence to change recipient sequence when custom recipients are added.
Version 3.0.5000.6, 25 Nov 2007 by Rajeeb - Added properties Screen and Fields to check for special routing list. - Updated RecipientList() to check for custom/special routing list for APP_ID. - If not found, default/standard workflow recipient list is used.
Version 3.0.5000.8, 17 Jul 2008 by Rajeeb - Added function to get string representation of DueAction enum and used for adding additional recipients. - Fixed to send reminders to additional recipients added from BO or at run-time.
Version 3.0.5000.9, 04 Mar 2009 by Rajeeb - Added support to notify the delegator after last approval along with applicant (based on configuration).
Version 3.0.5000.10, 01 Jul 2009 by Rajeeb - Added GetRecipientLineNo() and updated AddWorkflowRecipient() to add higher/additional recipients in the order of recipient's role, lineNo passed to procedure. - As email is being sent by service, additional recipients added in the end are not sent email notification. - Also, separated SQL for RN role (GetRecipientLineNo/GetRecipientSequence), as it may be added in the end of routing list.
Version 3.0.5000.11, 24 Jul 2009 by Rajeeb - Added RecipientFoundInRoutingList() to check if recipient in already added to recipient list(WF_REQUEST_RECIPS). - The check to avoid duplicate entries due to enhancement for passing full recipient list from BO. - Enhancement - BO passes whole routing list to StartRout() and since StartRout() inserts standard routing list first. This function can exclude those entries already inserted from the recipient list and insert only additional recipients.
Version 3.0.5000.12, 08 Oct 2009 by Rajeeb - Added retrieving recipient name, before updating WF_EMPE_LIST, as name is updated to NULL otherwise. - When cross-company recipient(higher approver) added from BO, name is not specified.
Version 3.0.5000.18, 01 Sep 2011 by Rajeeb Sharma - Fixed wrong EMPE_ID used for SUBMIT_ID (in WF_REQUEST), when custom routing list (like Positiong Management) used.
Version 3.0.5000.20, 16 Feb 2012 by Rajeeb Sharma - Fixed wrong EMPE_ID used for SUBMIT_ID (in WF_REQUEST), for non-custom routing lists.
Version 4.0.5000.7, 03 Sep 2015 by Rajeeb Sharma - Fixes for cross-company recipient info not inserted into WF_EMPE_LIST, when added from BO.
Version 4.0.5000.8, 02 Nov 2015 by Rajeeb Sharma - Fixes for replacing SV_MF_PREFER with SV_WF_MF_PREFER and column name changes in RecipientList().
Version 4.0.5000.9, 09 Feb 2017 by Rajeeb Sharma - Fixes for applicant's record retrieved wrongly (cross-company scenario) and updated in cross-company DB.
Version 5.0.0.15, 25-Feb-12 by Rajeeb Sharma - Added support for DUE_HOURS, recipient action due in Hours/Minutes (besides in Days)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
